section.p: Auto Provisioning (AP) automates node provisioning activities.
The key features of AP are:

ul.li: Automatically integrate a new node in the customer network with user provided information.
Automatically expand an existing node configuration.
Automatically configure a node for a hardware replace of an existing node.
Automatically migrate an existing node to new hardware.

section.title: Northbound Interface
section.p: The Auto Provisioning REST Northbound Interface (NBI) is a feature deployed in ENM. The protocol specification for this is available from the Auto Provisioning REST Northbound Interface document; 1/15519-CNA 403 2978 (ENM Application Launcher -> Documentation -> Elex).
